params.note: Protocol text describes CRISPR-Cas9 strategy for SHANK3 deletion in human PS cells using sgRNAs 1 and 4, primer pairs (1F+5R, etc.), electroporation, puromycin selection, colony isolation, and PCR validation. No actionable steps with sufficient structure for core ops could be reliably extracted. Manual isolation of SNRs (250–300 μm) under stereoscope and plating in low-adhesion 96-well plate mentioned, but context mismatched with CRISPR protocol focus.
